verses.name: Ezra 2:56
verses.text: The children of Jaalah, the children of Darkon, the children of Giddel,

verses.name: Ezra 2:57
verses.text: The children of Shephatiah, the children of Hattil, the children of Pochereth of Zebaim, the children of Ami.

verses.name: Ezra 2:58
verses.text: All the Nethinims, and the children of Solomon’s servants, were three hundred ninety and two.

verses.name: Ezra 2:59
verses.text: And these were they which went up from Tel–melah, Tel–harsa, Cherub, Addan, and Immer: but they could not shew their father’s house, and their seed, whether they were of Israel:

verses.name: Ezra 2:60
verses.text: The children of Delaiah, the children of Tobiah, the children of Nekoda, six hundred fifty and two.
